evidence.claim: WRAP XCODE utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing and AWS S3 for storage.
The company supports FHIR and HL7 standards for health data integration.
Integration with cloud services like AWS is emphasized in their engineering careers page.
Investigated AWS API Gateway for designing reliable APIs in health-tech solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of specific X12 or HIPAA-related use cases found on their site.
